structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.history: Repealed 1942Ky. Acts ch. 115,sec. 2. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3780, 3783.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Patrols in counties containing cities of first or second class; appointment; jurisdiction.
